TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed AspNetHostingPermissionLevel extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the trust level that is granted to an ASP.NET Web application.

span.span: Specifies the trust level that is granted to an ASP.NET Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Consulte [ASP.NET Code Access Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0001d062-f5cd-44e5-bb07-35155569fdb8) para obtener información detallada acerca de los permisos concedidos a cada nivel de confianza.See [ASP.NET Code Access Security](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0001d062-f5cd-44e5-bb07-35155569fdb8) for detailed information about the permissions that are granted to each trust level. Los miembros de esta enumeración definen los niveles de seguridad de aplicación que van desde plena confianza (la aplicación no está restringida por la seguridad de acceso del código) para confianza mínima (la aplicación tiene permiso de solo ejecución).The members of this enumeration define application security levels ranging from full trust (the application is unconstrained by code access security) to minimal trust (the application has permission only to execute). Establecer el nivel de confianza para un recurso de ASP.NET con la [confianza](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) elemento de configuración en un archivo Web.config o Machine.config.You set the trust level for an ASP.NET resource with the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) configuration element in a Web.config or Machine.config file. Si desea bloquear la directiva de seguridad para un sitio Web o un servidor específico, use el [ubicación](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5) elemento junto con el `allowOverride=false` atributo para asegurar esa confianza configuración de directiva no se puede invalidar localmente.If you want to lock security policy for a specific server or Web site, use the [location](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/922ef7d5-da38-4661-b1c6-5b9e5ceda1d5) element in conjunction with the `allowOverride=false` attribute to ensure that trust policy settings cannot be overridden locally.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel High = int32(500)

summary.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the trust level will succeed.

span.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the trust level will succeed.

summary.span: This level is intended for highly trusted managed-code applications that need to use most of the managed permissions that support semi-trusted access.

span.span: This level is intended for highly trusted managed-code applications that need to use most of the managed permissions that support semi-trusted access.

summary.span: It does not grant some of the highest permissions (for example, the ability to call into native code), but it does provide a way to run trusted applications with least privilege or to provide some level of constraints for highly trusted applications.

span.span: It does not grant some of the highest permissions (for example, the ability to call into native code), but it does provide a way to run trusted applications with least privilege or to provide some level of constraints for highly trusted applications.

summary.span: This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

span.span: This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Low = int32(300)

summary.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the level will succeed.

span.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the level will succeed.

summary.span: This level is intended to allow read-only access to limited resources in a constrained environment.

span.span: This level is intended to allow read-only access to limited resources in a constrained environment.

summary.span: This level is granted by specifying the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

span.span: This level is granted by specifying the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Medium = int32(400)

summary.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the level will succeed.

span.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for any level less than or equal to the level will succeed.

summary.span: This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

span.span: This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Minimal = int32(200)

summary.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for the level will succeed.

span.span: Indicates that features protected with a demand for the level will succeed.

summary.span: This level allows code to execute but not to interact with resources present on the system.

span.span: This level allows code to execute but not to interact with resources present on the system.

summary.span: This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level using the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

span.span: This level is granted by configuring at least the trust level using the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel None = int32(100)

summary.span: Indicates that no permission is granted.

span.span: Indicates that no permission is granted.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.AspNetHostingPermissionLevel Unrestricted = int32(600)

summary.span: Indicates that all demands for permission to use all features of an application will be granted.

span.span: Indicates that all demands for permission to use all features of an application will be granted.

summary.span: This is equivalent to granting trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.

span.span: This is equivalent to granting trust level in the [trust](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/eeed0fd3-5aaa-4196-94af-e6baea70dded) section in a configuration file.
